name: Codename: Blazer - [First Prototype]
description:
Codename: Blazer is the current title of a 2D, survival-style platformer. This prototype is meant to test out certain mechanics, and will be updated periodically with new mechanics and game aspects as they come into focus. It is highly requested that you give feedback regarding the game's movement and control aspects as much as possible.

When the prototype has been fully tested mechanically and the game moves into full production, this page will be shut down, and a new one under a different title will be created with updated mechanics, art, and assets.
